Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Appleton Road, between Overland Drive and Waterfront Way.
Room.LongDescription: One of the reasons there aren't more diagonally running roads in Oceancrest is because of the useless land they create. There is a small, triangular sliver of land between Appleton, Waterfront and Overland, which is more or less undevelopable. A couple of small monuments have been put up in dedicated to the farmers, but nothing else really can fit there.
